channel.title: Comments on: My 22nd Prodigy Show – Moscow, Russia, 09-Nov-2016
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit Schreiber
item.dc:creator: Amit Schreiber
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/old-blog/3404/comment-page-1#comment-2013686">Rom</a>.
Thanks a lot, Rom :D This all started back 2009, when I saw them 4 times over a 2-week timespan. Sometimes it seems like craziness to me, but it's so much fun that I can't stop :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Rom.

Thanks a lot, Rom :D
This all started back 2009, when I saw them 4 times over a 2-week timespan. Sometimes it seems like craziness to me, but it’s so much fun that I can’t stop :)

item.title: By: Rom
item.dc:creator: Rom
item.description: Dude, good to see you enjoying Prodigy all around the world! I wish you had more time to tour around :)
item.content:encoded: Dude, good to see you enjoying Prodigy all around the world! I wish you had more time to tour around :)
